problem_names:
lemma gcd_verify:
  "{{\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright> > 0 \<and> \<guillemotleft>Y > 0\<guillemotright>}} gcd_prog X Y {{x = gcd(\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright>, \<guillemotleft>Y\<guillemotright>)}}"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id \<Turnstile>
    x := \<guillemotleft>6\<guillemotright> ;;
    y := \<guillemotleft>21\<guillemotright> ;;
    while &x \<noteq>\<^sub>u
          &y invr 0 <\<^sub>u &x \<and>
                  0 <\<^sub>u &y \<and>
                  gcd\<^sub>u(&x, &y) =\<^sub>u
                  gcd\<^sub>u(\<guillemotleft>6\<guillemotright>, \<guillemotleft>21\<guillemotright>) do x :=
                              &x -
                              &y \<triangleleft> &y <\<^sub>u
           &x \<triangleright>\<^sub>r
                                 y := &y - &x od

lemma gcd_verify:
  "{{\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright> > 0 \<and> \<guillemotleft>Y > 0\<guillemotright>}} gcd_prog X Y {{x = gcd(\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright>, \<guillemotleft>Y\<guillemotright>)}}"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrace>0 <\<^sub>u \<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright> \<and>
             \<guillemotleft>0 < Y\<guillemotright>\<rbrace>
    x := \<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright> ;;
    y := \<guillemotleft>Y\<guillemotright> ;;
    while &x \<noteq>\<^sub>u
          &y invr 0 <\<^sub>u &x \<and>
                  0 <\<^sub>u &y \<and>
                  gcd\<^sub>u(&x, &y) =\<^sub>u
                  gcd\<^sub>u(\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright>, \<guillemotleft>Y\<guillemotright>) do x :=
                             &x -
                             &y \<triangleleft> &y <\<^sub>u
          &x \<triangleright>\<^sub>r
                                y := &y - &x od
    \<lbrace>&x =\<^sub>u
             gcd\<^sub>u(\<guillemotleft>X\<guillemotright>, \<guillemotleft>Y\<guillemotright>)\<rbrace>\<^sub>u
